#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

// Exponent of n in p!

int main()
{
	int t; 
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int sum = 0;
	for (int i = 1;floor(n/pow(2,i))!=0;i++)
	{
		sum = sum + floor(n/pow(2,i));
	}
	cout<<sum<<endl;
	sum = 0;
	for (int i = 1;floor(n/pow(3,i))!=0;i++)
	{
		sum = sum + floor(n/pow(3,i));
	}
	cout<<sum<<endl;
	sum = 0;
	for (int i = 1;floor(n/pow(5,i))!=0;i++)
	{
		sum = sum + floor(n/pow(5,i));
	}
	cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
}
